snippet.title: DeathTower - Kickstarter Reveal - Longer Trailer
snippet.description:
DeathTower is a 2.5D isometric roguelite tactical RPG. 
Make your way through each floor and ascend to the top.

Wishlist now!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1143910/DeathTower/

Support us on Kickstarter!
https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/headbangclub/deathtower-the-overclocked-roguelite-tactical-rpg

Music by Volkor X:
https://linktr.ee/volkorx
